Posts.Content: Im kinda scared right now. I was taking a shower and noticed something hard on my breast. I have no idea if its a lump or if its my bone or something. Then I thought yo myself and realized that I dont even know how a lump is because I never paid attention to breast cancer til now. Can someone tell me about the lump? How does it feel like when you touch it and is it noticable? Oh god...I dont wanna go to the doctor to find out its my bone or something. Im 15 by the way... thanks!
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump! PLEASE look!!

Posts.Content: Thanks guys Also, under my armpits, I spotted two very small, almost like a pimple-ish white head. They are TINY. Is this something to be concered about too or is this just a pimple. No, no one in my family has a history of breast cancer and yes, I have been having alot of caffine lately. I think I should check it out...
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump! PLEASE look!!

Posts.Content: Thanks again but I think the lump is due to my mestraul cycle. If its still there after my period, I will get it check out. Thank you!
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump! PLEASE look!!

Posts.Content: Thanks! Going to get it check out in a few days!
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump during Mestraul cycle and some generals...

Posts.Content: Recently I have discovered a lump but decided to have it check out after my period because I think the lump may be the result of my menstraul cycle. However, the lump is still there and my period ended yesterday. I was just wondering whats the time frame for it to fade away? Does the lump fade right after your period or will it take a few more days? I have been doing extensive research on breast lumps to ease my mind... So far, I have gathered that thin woman and woman will small breasts are able to detect the muscles in the breasts that is suppose to cover the ribs and sometimes can feel like layers of lumps. I THINK that my case can lean towards this because I am thin and I have very small breasts, approximately 30/32A. Do you think this is a possibility? The thing is that the lump on my left breast is definitely more distinguished and larger than my right one. It feels as if my right has a TINY lump, barely noticable. Once I fix things up with my health care profession, I will go and get an examination just to be on the safe side but it might take awhile. I cant help but worry and stress over this. I guess I kinda want some reassurence in the meantime... Thanks for listening to me ramble on. Please post your thoughts/suggestions! Thanks again!
Posts.Title: Question about breast lump during Mestraul cycle and some generals...
